Posts.HTML:
Anyone understand why the below 'eval' code doesn't work in a room description text box? Does it not work with Quest 5.7?

{once:Room description}
{eval:PrintCentered ("insert centred message")}
{notfirst:Other room description}

Posts.EditableText:
The way the text processor works is to convert the string with the directives into a new string, and then that gets printed. The eval directive is expecting some Quest code that will result in a string.

The `PrintCentered` prints the text - which you do not want at this point - but does not return anything, so cannot be used with eval.
Posts.HTML:
The way the text processor works is to convert the string with the directives into a new string, and then that gets printed. The eval directive is expecting some Quest code that will result in a string.

The PrintCentered prints the text - which you do not want at this point - but does not return anything, so cannot be used with eval.
